liquibase.change.AddAutoIncrementChange

liquibase.change.AddAutoIncrementChange Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for liquibase.change.AddAutoIncrementChange:
[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Makes an existing column into an auto-increment column.

This change is only valid for databases with auto-increment/identity columns. The current version does not support MS-SQL.

Definition at line 30 of file AddAutoIncrementChange.java.
